creditline: The Marilyn C. Benson Endowment for Art Acquisition
markings: R edge near selvedge, stamped: Paule Marrot
text: Rectangular textile length with blue ground and repeating designs of clusters of tulips and floral sprays. The tulips in the clusters are red, white, and blue, and they seem to grow out of a single plant with green stem and leaves.
title: Les Tulipes (Tulips)
